name: An Unexpected Encounter
desc:
An abnormality with the Metaverse Navigator send the Phantom Thieves to a strange castle.
As they continue in a daze, they face an unexpected encounter.

name: Run
desc:
The Phantom Thieves encounter two unfamiliar Thieves, Mona and Skull, and establish an alliance with them.
Skull has been to this castle before, but it doesn't seem like it was a positive experience for him.

name: Tasteless Castle
desc:
The Phantom Thieves continue feeling their way forward in search of the Core.
The interior of the castle can hardly be described as being in good taste.

name: Raucous Teammates
desc:
Compared to Kiuchi's Palace, the castle is filled with dark corridors and disturbing rooms.
Closer seems to feel uncomfortable here...

name: Prison Break
desc:
Working together to beat back the Shadows, the Phantom Thieves fight their way to the underground prison.
There, they come across a lost teammate confined to a cell.

name: Person with Good Taste
desc:
Panther joins her allies and the search for the Core continues.
Their final missing teammate, Joker, is still missing. Just where could he be?

name: Unpleasant Memories
desc:
The Phantom Thieves backtrack to a certain room at the castle's west end.
Panther seems to have some bad memories of this place...

name: For Friends
desc:
In an area called the Training Hall of Love, the Phantom Thieves witness the unfair treatment of several cognitive beings.
Among them, Closer spots a familiar face...

name: Treasured Cards
desc:
The Phantom Thieves find themselves in dire straits as they are suddenly attacked by strong Shadows.
Luckily, they still have an ace up their sleeve.

name: Thieves' Alliance
desc:
With Joker's return, the allies have all finally assembled.
The Phantom Thieves set out once more in pursuit of the Core.

name: Past Wisdom
desc:
Countless traps await the Phantom Thieves on their path to the Core.
They must work together in order to overcome the difficulties that lie ahead.

name: Temporary Rest
desc: The Phantom Thieves, exhausted from the continuous campaign of battles and exploration, decide to take a short rest.

name: The Last Challenge
desc:
After their rest, the Phantom Thieves begin their search for the third ball.
Although they hoped for a quick job, things don't appear to be that simple.

name: It's Ours!
desc:
The Phantom Thieves have finally arrived at the heart of the castle.
Can they successfully steal the Core...?

name: Reunion
desc: Another anomaly from the Metaverse Navigator has sent the Thieves to a place resembling some sort of museum... Will they encounter familiar faces here, too?

name: Another Core?
desc: After entering the museum, the Phantom Thieves encounter Panther and Fox. It seems that, once again, they have been separated from their comrades, and so the two groups of Thieves decide to team up to find their lost allies. But as they explore, Cattle notices something peculiar...

name: Stand Up Against Injustice
desc: During the search for their teammates, Fox turns his attention to the paintings hung on the walls of the museum. This place seems to resemble a certain Palace, one with which he and the owner shared a deep connection.

name: Find the Password!
desc: The Phantom Thieves make their way to the second exhibition room. The museum's inner security seems to be very tight...

name: The Brute Force Method
desc: The Phantom Thieves continue their search for the Core as they slip past various security measures. What awaits them ahead...?

name: Deeper We Delve
desc: Although the Thieves successfully acquired one Core, it seems that another still remains. In order to obtain the remaining Core, the group ventures deeper into the museum...

name: Catch Me If You Can
desc: The Phantom Thieves head toward the security room in order to find the way out of the art museum, but the patrolling Shadows and security measures are not to be taken lightly.

name: Beauty Is Bizarre
desc: Just as the Phantom Thieves are about to reach the museum exit, an unexpected hurdle stands in their way. Will they be able to navigate their way through this strange path?

name: Push Through!
desc: The Core's presence grows closer with every step. The exit is within reach!

name: Which is Real?
desc: At last, the Phantom Thieves escape the museum. There, they come across something most unexpected...

name: Queen Takes the Stage
desc:
The Thieves arrive at a building closely resembling Kaneshiro's Palace. No one could hide their disgust at the unsightly structure brimming with greed.
Outside the Palace, they find their missing comrade Closer, accompanied by another reliable new teammate.
victoryText: Go to the bank hall control room

name: Wealth Beyond Imagination
desc: The Phantom Thieves stumble upon a mountain of cash lying in the Palace, and their minds run wild as they imagine the possibilities. If only it was real...

name: Going Underground
desc: Suspecting that the Core might be hidden on the lower levels of the bank, the Phantom Thieves search for a way down.

name: Underground Sweep
desc: In addition to the patrolling Shadows, various traps and security measures block the Thieves' path. In order to obtain the Core, their only choice is to persevere and push onward.
victoryText: Investigate the east side of the staff passageway

name: Screen Saver
desc: The Phantom Thieves find themselves in a dire situation as they're cornered by the Shadows! But just as all hope seems lost, a certain somebody helps them from afar...
victoryText: Head to the staff passageway security room

name: Head for the Vault!
desc:
After their narrow escape, the Phantom Thieves continue their exploration...
The next destination has been decided: the underground vault.
victoryText: Head to the laundering office lower floor

name: Let's Get Pumped
desc: At last, the Phantom Thieves arrive at the vault. Suspecting that great danger lies ahead, Skull suggests they get themselves fired up before entering.

name: Vault Exploration
desc: The Thieves continue their exploration of the vault. Many traps, security devices and powerful Shadows lie in wait for them...

name: The Depths of the Vault
desc:
The presence of the Core grows closer.
It looks like the final destination of this journey will lead to the very heart of the vault.

name: The Final Battle
desc: After much hardship, the Phantom Thieves have finally reached the heart of the vault. Can they defeat the menacing final Shadow that awaits them and steal the final Core?

name: Girl in the Desert
desc:
Due to a Metaverse Navigator error, the Thieves once again appear in an unexpected place.
While standing in bewilderment at the vast desert wasteland before them, they hear a voice calling for help.
victoryText: Find the source of the distress call

name: The Third Alliance
desc:
While traversing the desert with Oracle, the Phantom Thieves arrive at a pyramid, where they once again encounter Queen and Fox.
While delighted at the reunion, it seems other allies are still unaccounted for.

name: Shade and Sun
desc:
As the Phantom Thieves continue into the pyramid's underground area, they come across Panther and Skull.
However, upon seeing the joyous reunion between Closer and Panther, Oracle suddenly feels pain...

name: Into the Pyramid
desc:
In the Chamber of Rejection, it seems that not just enemies, but traps and gimmicks, lie in wait for the Thieves.
Sharp wits, in addition to raw strength, will be required in order to push forward.

name: Mural: Snake
desc:
As the Phantom Thieves continue inward, they encounter a strange mural of a snake.
It seems the mural in the original Palace was different, but what could that mean...?

name: Mural: Chicken
desc:
Continuing from the snake, the Thieves happen upon a mural of a chicken.
While pondering its meaning, a portion of Oracle's past is brought to light.

name: Hidden Path
desc:
Facing stronger enemies as they continue inward, the present path grows dangerous.
The Thieves must find the right path, all while fending off Shadows.

name: Mural: Pig
desc:
The Phantom Thieves come across yet another peculiar mural.
At first glance, the animals in it don't seem to be connected at all... but then, a look of realization appears on Oracle's face.

name: The Final Stretch
desc:
As the Core's presence grows stronger, large numbers of traps and gimmicks hinder the path ahead.
Can the Thieves unite to overcome these obstacles?

name: Bring it Down!
desc:
After overcoming many trials, the Phantom Thieves have finally arrived at the Core.
Waiting for them was an enormous enemy far beyond their expectations.

name: My Name Is Beauty Thief!
desc: With the Phantom Thieves safely reunited, the two teams join forces once again. The newest member Noir seem somewhat anxious... Noticing this, Joker decides to take action...

name: Spaceport Recon
desc: The Phantom Thieves continue their search for the core, but the Shadows that roam the Palace obstruct them at every turn...

name: Spaceport Sweep
desc: Slowly but surely, the Phantom Thieves make their way through the complex structure of the spaceport. Each step brings them closer to the Core.

name: Mechanical Slave
desc: Upon infiltrating the factory sector of the spaceport, Noir is pained to see the broken robots on the conveyer belt being treated like worthless junk...

name: Wanted: High-Rank ID
desc: In order to progress further, it seems the Phantom Thieves will need to track down a high-ranking Employee ID. On they search, slicing through any shadows that stand in their way...

name: Parallel Universe...?
desc: The subject of Noir's father's company and a certain popular burger chain lead the Phantom Thieves to consider that their respective realities may in fact be parallel universes. Nevertheless, they agree to keep working together, and resume their hunt for the Core.

name: An Entangled World
desc: The Phantom Thieves continue to ponder over the crossing of their two worlds: one with desire, and one without. Could it be that someone is trying to merge these two worlds together...?

name: Fly to Space!
desc: The Phantom Thieves' search for the Core continues. It seems that the only way forward is by leaping through the vast vacuum of space.

name: Head to the Depths
desc: After traversing through space, the Phantom Thieves arrive at the final sector. Weaving their way past the powerful Shadows and tight security systems, they approach the inner sanctum where the Core awaits...

name: Light of Salvation
desc: At last, the Phantom Thieves reach the depths of the spaceport. Upon confronting the enraged Shadow guarding the Core, they point at Wonder as they make an ominous declaration...

name: A Chance Encounter
desc:
After sensing a disturbance within Mementos, Lufel sets off on his own to investigate... but doesn't return.
While searching for his whereabouts, Wonder runs into two mysterious twins.

name: So-Called Investigation
desc:
The mysterious twins state that they have come to investigate this world.
Wonder agrees to assist them... but it seems their investigation largely involves wandering the city.

name: Commencing Special Assignment
desc:
Concerned about Lufel, the Phantom Thieves assemble at Shibuya Station.
Having completed their investigation of this world, the twins accompany the thieves into Mementos as they search for their feathered friend.

name: Passage Between Worlds
desc:
The Phantom Thieves delve into Mementos in search of Lufel's whereabouts and a way for the twins to return to their world.
There at the depths, they discover a strange rift... and a powerful Shadow guarding it.

name: Dimensional Wardens
desc:
After returning from Mementos, the exhausted Phantom Thieves decide to swing by the diner.
Wonder reaches into his pocket, and happens to find a piece of paper...
